xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: rendering.macro.chartjs.name=ChartJS ### Missing: rendering.macro.chartjs.description=Simple HTML5 charts using the canvas element. rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.type.name=Typ ### Missing: rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.type.description=The type of chart. Choose from: line, bar, radar, pie, doughnut, polarArea, bubble, scatter. rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.options.name=Opcje ### Missing: rendering.macro.chartjs.parameter.options.description=Advanced options specified as JSON. Checkout the Chart.js documentation for the available configuration options. ### Missing: rendering.macro.chartjs.placeholder=Chart placeholder
### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.name=Table to ChartJS ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.description=Draws a chart using ChartJS and the data read from a table. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.type.name=Typ ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.type.description=The type of chart. Choose from: line, bar, radar, pie, doughnut, polarArea, bubble, scatter. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.options.name=Opcje ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.options.description=Advanced chart options specified as JSON. Checkout the Chart.js documentation for the available configuration options. rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.table.name=Tablica ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.table.description=Identifies the source table. ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.multipleDataSets.name=Multiple Data Sets ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.multipleDataSets.description=Whether the specified table includes multiple data sets. ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.dataSetLabel.name=Data Set Label ### Missing: rendering.macro.tableToChartJS.parameter.dataSetLabel.description=The index of the table column that represents the data set label.
